Class TextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • TextBox
        • TextField

  • public class TextField
extends TextBox
    A sprite that can have text displayed and then outputted based on the key it has been given. It can be forced to only accept numbers or letters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String emptyText
      What the field will display when there is no text on it.
      java.awt.Color emptyTextColor
      The color of the empty text.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> listeners
      A list of objects that are interested in knowing when we are given the key code to send our text.
      int maxTextLength
      The maximum length that the text within this field can be.
      TextFieldMode textMode
      The type of characters that the field will allow to be entered.

      • Fields inherited from class TextBox

        backgroundColor, drawBG, fontSize, text, textColor

      • Fields inherited from class Sprite

        drawOrder, interactable, name, size, transform

      Constructor and Description

      Default Constructor.

    • Field Detail

      • maxTextLength

        public int maxTextLength
        The maximum length that the text within this field can be.

      • textMode

        public TextFieldMode textMode
        The type of characters that the field will allow to be entered.

      • emptyText

        public java.lang.String emptyText
        What the field will display when there is no text on it.

      • emptyTextColor

        public java.awt.Color emptyTextColor
        The color of the empty text.

      • listeners

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> listeners
        A list of objects that are interested in knowing when we are given the key code to send our text. Must have the buttonEvent interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextField

        public TextField(SpriteRegistry sr,
                 Transform transform,
                 processing.core.PVector size)
        Default Constructor.
        Parameters:
        sr - The sprite registry that will display this.
        transform - The transform of this sprite.
        size - The size of the text field.

    • Method Detail

      • drawText

        protected void drawText(processing.core.PApplet applet)
        Description copied from class: TextBox
        Draws the text of the text box, designed to be overridden by subclasses
        Overrides:
        drawText in class TextBox
        Parameters:
        applet - The applet to draw the text on

      • addKey

        public void addKey(processing.event.KeyEvent event)
        Intended to be called by the InputManager when a key is pressed while we are being focused on. Will add a character to the text if it is allowed (right type and not bumping into max length).
        Parameters:
        event - The key event to determine what exactly was pressed.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Object listener)
        Adds an object to the field's list of listeners.
        Parameters:
        listener - The object that will be notified when this field is triggered. Must implement ButtonEvent.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(java.lang.Object listener)
        Removes an object from the field's list of listeners.
        Parameters:
        listener - The object that does not want to be notified any more by this field.

      • notifyListeners

        public void notifyListeners()
        Goes through all the listeners this field has and notifies them
